page.title: 18MACHINES IN WILMSLOW HOMES
page.content:
We surveyed electrical appliances in the homes of children in Lindow school.
Telephones................... 98% Telephone answering machines. 6% Micro wave ovens............. 16% Electric cookers............. 53% Automatic washing machines... 95% Tumble driers................ Dish washers................. 36% Electric clocks/Watches...... 93% Electric calculators......... 90% Musical keyboards............ 31% Televisions..................100% Video recorders.............. 46% Tape recorders............... 96% Record players............... 96% Radios.......................100% Micro computers.............. 57%
